title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.5 - Five-day supplemental application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.5 - Five-day supplemental application

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision in this Part, a grower
or processor may utilize the services of a registered farm labor contractor for
not more than five days, provided that within 24 hours after the beginning of
such utilization he countersigns the application supplied by the commissioner
for such farm labor contractor and immediately thereafter transmits said
application to the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
197.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
